topic.title: Creating zites - unknown file issue
topic.body:
How do I load a file, for example, a .dae file (collada file) for use in my zite (for example https://aframe.io/) ?

-> It only works if .dae file is loaded from an external site.

Is there any kind of configuration to load this file directly from the data folder?

1543928148_1E5pgBaKNzFU9Loeg7eDGrSkXqJAq.body: It's good. The people will start thinking about it. Too bad for tumblr, seen as a porn place by the most of people. A perfect shot in their own feet.

1545508330_1GQavEpwS1D6pdD3suzaEu8Y25NFz.body:
> [tusiko](#comment_43_1G2W1r5Eh1M81v8sUanDq2Cj4xnaRJurgs): No. You can just store this file in the data folder.The link has to be named in this case:data/a.daeNo slash or anything else before. All links must be relative. I use pictures in my blog, which are stored in the /img folder. It works.

No. It's not a file path issue. It's a filetype issue. I must find a way to register this file to be used. It's like a firewall. 

I've tried with "three.js so" too. 

https://threejs.org/examples/#webgl_animation_skinning_morph

All the linked .js works well, except the .glb file. It must be hosted in another site to work.

> [ssdifnskdjfnsdjk](#comment_565_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnXadUtS): @abpcalex Zeronet works with html, sql, javascript i think. Can this collada file work "in javascript"? https://duckduckgo.com/?q=collada+dae+javascript

Sure! This is pure javascript:

https://aframe.io/examples/showcase/anime-UI/

You can even create an emulator in javascript if you want and have the knowledge to do it.

> [abpcalex](#comment_4_1GQavEpwS1D6pdD3suzaEu8Y25NFzNxvge): Sure! This is pure javascript: [...]

Plus... The collada file (.dae) is just a xml file. You can open it with a text editor.

> [tusiko](#comment_47_1G2W1r5Eh1M81v8sUanDq2Cj4xnaRJurgs): Good to know, thx.

The weirdest thing is that if you just double click the .html file it works fine locally without a server. (E.g.: python -m http.server)

OK. Here we go again.

Here is the source code of an example of three.js in pastebin. If you create a new zite and just put the contents into index.html. It will work. 

http://127.0.0.1:43110/1MgHVPCE1ve6QfKrgsqCURzRj72HrRWioz/?1GQavEpwS1D6pdD3suzaEu8Y25NFzNxvge_0

But, if you download the RobotExpressive.glb file https://cdn.glitch.com/1e4464f1-1ad4-410a-895a-3748f1b6d166%2FRobotExpressive.glb?1544592602933 into your data folder and uncomment the 116 line and comment the 115 line, it will stop working.
